title: Cherry Ice Lost Mary Tappo Prefilled Pods
description: Lost Mary Tappo Cherry Ice Pre-filled Replacement Pods contain an e-liquid with a light blend of rich red cherries that has been carefully combined with a refreshing hit of crisp, icy coolness. Every pack of Lost Mary Tappo pods features two replacement pods that have been pre-filled with 2ml of nicotine salt vape juice in a 2% (20mg) nicotine strength. The Lost Mary Tappo pod has been created to be used with the Tappo Pod Kit by Lost Mary , specifically. The Tappo replacement pods can last for up to 600 puffs each before they are ready to be replaced, allowing you to enjoy up to 1200 puffs per pack of Lost Mary pods, and making them a cheaper, more sustainable alternative for those looking to stop using disposable vapes . The Lost Mary Tappo replacement pods are available in more than 25 different flavours , with each based on the same popular flavours as the best selling BM600 disposable vapes - there are also new flavours still being released! Lost Mary Tappo Flavours: Apple Watermelon Banana Ice Blue Razz Blue Sour Raspberry Cherry Cola Cherry Ice Double Apple Grape Kiwi PassionFruit Guava Lemon Ice Lemon and Lime Maryturbo Mix Berries Peach Ice Pineapple Ice Pineapple PassionFruit Lemon Red Cherry Silky Tobacco Spearmint Strawberry Ice Strawberry Raspberry Triple Mango Tropical Fruit USA Mix Watermelon Lost Mary Tappo Pre-filled Replacement Pod Features: Flavour : Cherry, Ice, Cool Pod Capacity : 2ml Nicotine Strength : 20mg (2%) Nicotine Type : Nicotine Salts TPD Compliant Prefilled Pods Compatible with Lost Mary Tappo Pod Kit Lost Mary Tappo Package Contains: 2x Lost Mary Tappo Cherry Ice Pre-filled Replacement Pods
